alert.note: Alert for Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 10:10PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Comanche, northwestern Cotton, southeastern Jackson, south central Kiowa, Tillman and north central Wilbarger Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1010 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Indiahoma to 5 miles north of Hollister to 3 miles east of Fargo. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Lawton, Frederick, Cache, Snyder, Tipton, Chattanooga, Mountain Park, Medicine Park, Indiahoma, Manitou, Faxon, Headrick, Hollister, Loveland, Fort Sill, Fargo, southern Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge, Doris Campground, and The Visitor Center. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 45 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor NOAA Weather Radio, local radio stations or available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
